title: Can you follow Ai’s pace!?
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Ah-! Let’s go look at the next one! Come on, Umi! Quick quick!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Pl-, please wait, Ai!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Okay Okaay♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Geez….when someone comes with you, do you not know the word “calm down”? You’re just like Honoka….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Honoka is also like this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Yes. When we go shopping she goes around looking everywhere, it’s really hard to follow her<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hehehe~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Wh-, what is it, what’s with that face….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Umi, you’re used to this pace already aren’t you! That calms me down~! Alright then, with that said, we’re speeding up! Try to not get left behind okay!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Wh-, wait….Ai! Aiiii--!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
